main event: An object resembling a small aircraft was observed in Sioux City, Iowa, emitting red flames and smoke.
interesting points: The object was large as a small aircraft., It was seen engulfed in flames with smoke emitting from the rear., The flames extinguished suddenly, leaving only a smoke trail., The object was moving from south to north at approximately 1,000 feet off the horizon., The sighting lasted between 1 to 1.5 minutes.
sighted object: an object as large as a small aircraft emitting red flames and smoke
